message:
Is there anyone here worked with Apache Spark using python?
I have a very strange problem. I wrote a little spark streaming job that monitor an HDFS directory, read the newly added files, and send the date to Kafka. 
When I try to submit the job I got an error (ImportError: cannot import name KafkaProducer)
The error is simple as you see, the script can not import KafkaProducer module. The problem is that I could import it from python shell, ipython shell, and pyspark shell without any problem. 
What do you think the problem is? 
Here is the code of the job
story: Anas Rabei shared a link to the group: Egyptian Geeks.
name: [Python] spark_streaming_job - Pastebin.com
caption: pastebin.com

data.message: Maher Mohamed Gamal do you have any idea?
Is the module installed on all the nodes ?

After alot of tries I could solve the issue but the solution is weird.
Simply I made 
cat old_file.py > new_file.py 
Then submit the new_file.py and every thing worked fine. 
I have no idea what is going on. This is the second time I am facing this problem with python scripts. 
I posted another question but this time on serverfault instead of stackoverflow by this problem as I think it is an operating system caching or something like that.
Here is the link if anyone is interested 
http://serverfault.com/questions/774275/python-script-can-not-import-kafkaproducer
I hope getting an answer.
Finally, Thanks for you guys.
